title: Chinese pork dumplings
ingredients: ['500g minced pork (not extra lean)', '1 teaspoon crushed garlic', '5 spring onions, chopped (separate green part for garnish)', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon white rice wine vinegar', '2 teaspoons sugar', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 pinch black pepper', '25 dumpling wrappers', 'oil for frying', 'sesame seeds, for garnish']
